impactDescription: I attracted users to optimism by donating (burning) UBI. Optimism gained postive marketing as people receive money for their freely earned UBI on Optimism. The 18721 Profiles of https://app.proofofhumanity.id/ can now see that the UBI they are earning can be sold on optimism. 18721 people from a wide variety of backgrounds are now incentivised to learn about and use optimism.
contributionDescription:
I have incentivised 18721 people to learn to use optimism for free UBI. I have made optimism L2 with most donated (burnt) UBI. I have made optimism L2 with most liquid UBI market. I have spent 980 OP (1,254.4 USD) on buying and destroying forever UBI. Thus donating 980 OP (1,254.4 USD) to all 18721 profiles of https://app.proofofhumanity.id/ , people from all backgrounds of wealth. This supported the price of UBI https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/universal-basic-income using optimism.

Vitalik has done similar on mainnet 
https://basicincometoday.com/the-founder-of-ethereum-just-dumped-a-bunch-of-meme-coins-and-used-the-funds-to-support-a-crypto-ubi-project/

This is description of how it helps people.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qzmHTXjg_c0

contributionLinks.description: this shows the burning of UBI on optimism
this shows OP leaving wallet and UBI entering. OP is buying UBI
this shows KyberSwap: Meta Aggregation Router v2 where op is buying ubi
